get.summary: Articles table with RLS enabled. Only admins and editors can create/update. Authors can update their own. Only admins can delete.

post.summary: Articles table with RLS enabled. Only admins and editors can create/update. Authors can update their own. Only admins can delete.

delete.summary: Articles table with RLS enabled. Only admins and editors can create/update. Authors can update their own. Only admins can delete.

patch.summary: Articles table with RLS enabled. Only admins and editors can create/update. Authors can update their own. Only admins can delete.
